abstract: A member of the United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission comments on China’s forays into Canada’s giant oil patch.
snippet: A member of the United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission comments on China’s forays into Canada’s giant oil patch.
lead_paragraph: State-owned companies like PetroChina are probably going to be in the market for more energy deals in Canada due to that country’s high dollar, said the former Clinton administration trade official Patrick Mulloy, a member of the United States-China Economic and Security Review Commission.

headline.main: Reflections on China’s Oil Sands Bid
